House Bill/Resolution NO. HB01045
FULL TITLE : AN ACT PROHIBITING LABOR-ONLY CONTRACTING AND REGULATING JOB CONTRACTING AND SUB-CONTRACTING
ABSTRACT : Seeks to stop contractual employment and uphold and promote workers’ rights to job security by making subcontracting superfluous and making employers responsible for their employees.
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : DE JESUS, EMMI A., BROSAS, ARLENE D.
DATE FILED : 2016-07-05
SIGNIFICANCE: NATIONAL
NATURE : Welfare
